comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Do new project eclipse with following code : http://android-er.blogspot.fr/2012/05/implement-onitemgesturelistener-on.html What is the expected output? What do you see instead? 2. use onItemSingleTapUp or onItemLongPress to see the toast display.. 3. toast is not display :-( What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? osmdroid-android-3.0.10.jar and http://www.slf4j.org/android/ slf4j-android-1.5.8.jar On Debian Wheezy 7.0 Please provide any additional information below: When I using osmdroid-android-3.0.8.jar and http://www.slf4j.org/android/ slf4j-android-1.6.1-RC1.jar toast displayed :-)
i have the same problem, i think i'll come back to version 3.0.8
when using the single tap the app just stop runing, but in the earlier version didn't happend it
